summary: SummaryKate Somerville's KateCeuticals Lifting Eye Cream is a skin clinic treatment for your eyes – at home. Its potent blend of high-performance ingredients smooths and hydrates aging skin to visibly soften wrinkles, while targeting under eye puffiness and dark circles.
details: DetailsBenefitsFirm skin + revitalize the appearance of crow’s feet + wrinklesSoothe puffinessBrighten dark circlesKey IngredientsTri-Peptide + Hyaluronic Acid Complex : Relaxes the appearance of wrinkles while increasing skin firmness + elasticity.Brown + Red Algae + Cucumber Extract : Relieves dark under eye circles and puffiness.Vitamin C : Brightens and firms skin.Hyaluronic Acid : Hydrates and plumps skin.Safflower + Sunflower Seed Oils : Lightweight hydration to target under eye dryness.Research ResultsAfter just 1 use*96% showed improvement in the appearance of crow’s feet, fine lines, wrinkles, and hydration.93% reported the product de-puffed their under-eye area and visibly diminished deep wrinkles.After 2 weeks of use*96% reported the product firmed and lifted their undereye area and had a long-lasting impact on their fine lines and wrinkles with continued use.96% reported the product firmed and lifted under eye area.Clinically-proven results based on independent clinical study.Item 2579677How To UseGood for: Morning + EveningHow often: DailyApplication: Gently pat a small amount around the eye area, before serums or moisturizer.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Propanediol, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Cocoglycerides, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Stearyl Heptanoate, Pentaerythrityl Distearate, Squalane, Triheptanoin, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Stearyl Alcohol, Stearyl Caprylate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-12, Morus Alba Leaf Extract, Undaria Pinnatifida Extract, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Adenosine, Ceramide NG, Phytosterols, Faex/Yeast Extract/Extrait de Levure, Withania Somnifera Root Extract, Soy Amino Acids, Hordeum Vulgare/Hordeum Vulgare Extract/Extrait d'Orge, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Seed Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Dipeptide Diaminobutyroyl Benzylamide Diacetate, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Dilinoleic Acid/Butanediol Copolymer, Castor Oil/IPDI Copolymer, PEG-10 Phytosterol, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Tocopheryl Acetate, Behenyl Alcohol, Tribehenin, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Lactic Acid, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Good for: Morning + EveningHow often: DailyApplication: Gently pat a small amount around the eye area, before serums or moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Expensive But Gives Results
reviews.comments: The price point is high, but it works so well! I used it day and night until the entire bottle was gone, and the results speak for themselves! If this is in your budget, you won't regret purchasing.

reviews.headline: Good, not great; overpriced
reviews.comments: It's hydrating, but I saw no other benefits after using it for a couple months, as opposed to a couple different Clarins products I tried. Does nothing for dark circles. Definitely not worth the price; there are a lot of great moisturizers for the eye area out there at half or a quarter the price that do so much more thab just hydrate.

reviews.headline: This dried up my eyes
reviews.comments: This eye cream dried up under my eyes terribly it actually made my under eyes look worse.  I had to buy another moisturizer just to get my skin back to the way it was.  Took over three weeks to see somewhat normality return to under my eyes, though they still have not recovered the elasticity back..  I am so disappointed on how bad this made under my eyes look.

reviews.headline: Good things come on small packages.
reviews.comments: I have been using this eye cream for a little less that a week, two times a day. I have I notice a more "awake " looking eye" give only the moisture and sleek on around my eye. Tiny mines around my eyes have see to diminish a bit. Will continue to use to see what a few more weeks of using this eye cream I'll do further.

faceoff_positive.comments: I have always been a little skeptical of eye creams. Sure, they moisturize the delicate skin around the eye, but I never saw "results". Until. This. Product. I received a sample with a previous order and decided to try it out. I was very surprised the next morning. The bags under my eyes were less puffy. My laugh lines were less apparent. Even my top eyelid looked "tighter". I definitely looked more awake. I used every drop of that sample and, when the website had a sale, I ordered a full size. It is expensive considering the size of the bottle, but you only need to use a little of the product. The product also suggests using it AM and PM, but I only use it at night to extend the life of my bottle. Even using it once a day, I have seen results. This is the REAL DEAL!
faceoff_positive.headline: The Real Deal

faceoff_negative.comments: I have used Kate Somerville products for more than 5 years and I have never had a negative thing to say about their products. My skin is sensitive, combination, and at 43 I have anti-aging concerns . I have happily used the Firming Serum for over a year and I was excited to try the Firming Eye Cream. I put it on after my normal KS skincare routine and the next morning my eyes were swollen and red. Eventually that became red and dry and peeling. From ONE application!!! Not sure if I got a bad batch but I will never use this again. (Which is horrible considering the money I paid for it.) A week later and I'm still trying to reduce the puffiness and skin peeling around my eyes.
faceoff_negative.headline: First KS miss
